ssot__FlowElementRun__dlm.name: Flow Element Run
ssot__FlowElementRun__dlm.description: The Flow Element Run DMO represents the status of a single element executed within a flow run.

ssot__CompletedDateTime__c.description: The date and time when the flow completes or encounters an error. After this field has a value, no further processing can take place through the Flow Element Run DMO.

ssot__ErrorDescriptionText__c.description: The description of the Error Reason. This field is available in API version 59.0 and later.

ssot__ErrorReason__c.description: The error type if the flow run encountered an error. This field is available in API version 59.0 and later. Valid values are:DeactivatedUser — The user that activated the flow is no longer active, so the flow can’t execute.InternalError — There was a system error that prevented the flow from executing.

ssot__FlowElementId__c.description: A reference ID to the associated flow element.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Flow Element Run DMO.

ssot__FlowElementRunStatus__c.description: The status of the flow element run.

ssot__FlowRunId__c.description: A reference ID to the associated flow run of the flow element run.

ssot__ScheduledDateTime__c.description: The date and time when the flow element run was scheduled for execution. Actual execution time can be later due to queuing, retries, or other issues.
